mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (planid, userid, parentid, comment_time, content, rate, comment_type, deleteflag)VALUES (#{planid}, #{userid}, #{parentid}, #{comment_time}, #{content},#{rate}, #{comment_type}, #{deleteflag})
mapper.select: SELECT id, planid, userid, parentid, comment_time, content, rate, comment_type, deleteflag FROM comment ORDER BY comment_time DESC limit #{offset_row} , #{page_size}
